body.name: Fifine USB Computer Microphone, Plug &Play Desktop Condenser PC Laptop Mic,Mute Button with LED Indicator, Compatible with Windows/Mac, Ideal for YouTube,Zoom,Recording,Twitch Games(K054)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 21 mins
features: 【Smooth Recording】 Flexible gooseneck design allows you to adjust the USB microphone for PC to your level, and features a cardioid polar pattern that with tailored response for speech maximizes intelligibility in speech while reducing the chance for feedback.A suitable solution for meetings and presentation applications,improve people's ability to hear within the Zoom video conference software.

【USB Plug&Play】The gooseneck provides up to 12" (32.5cm) of length and easy-to-use microphone positioning. Connect the USB cardioid microphone to your laptop or PC via the USB connector and you're on your way to recording, chatting on Skype, Discord and meet all your computer-audio needs. Helps you record directly into your computer.

【Stylish Design】Gooseneck computer microphone for Zoom meetings can be adjusted by the speaker to accommodate taller or shorter people and so forth. Low-profile and quite appealing gooseneck design making for a very clean appearance. Accurate positioning via bendy youtube microphone is a suitable solution for podiums, houses-of-worship, schools, conference and presentation applications.

【Volume Knob & Mute Button】Easy for you to adjust the input volume for your condensor microphone, a silent mute switch with LED light can indicate when the computer recording microphone is active to speak. Sturdy weighted base with non-skid rubber mounts to table, desk ensures a firm support for long gooseneck for medical/legal reporting or conference. USB mic is suitable for podcasting and live chat, IP communication, vocal recording.

【Solid Construction】Twitch stream recording vocals USB microphone for PC laptop with adjustable metal gooseneck and heavy-duty ABS base to make sure it stable to use. Non-detachable premium 6.56ft(2 meters) USB cable, a user manual and friendly technical support.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: [Great Sound Quality]-Condenser cardioid microphone, podcast streaming microphone, picks up is very crisp and very clear,fast and accurate recognition. [A Silent Mute Switch with LED Indicator]-For clear indication of the USB computer microphone status. [On-board Gain Control]-Adjust input volume level of microphone for computer by gain knob easily.Good fit for Skype, Discord, Twitch. [Flexible Rigid-pipe Design]-The gooseneck computer microphone for Zoom meetings provides up to 12" (32.5cm) of length and easy, flexible microphone positioning. [Communications USB Cardioid Microphone for PC]-Wide frequency response of 50Hz--20KHz for accurate sound reproduction. [Desktop Base]-Gaming USB microphone recording vocals with heavy duty housing ensures a firm support for long goosenecks. [6.56ft long USB Cord]-USB microphone for laptop with USB cord is long enough to reach the back of your PC, and plug and play for quickly use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly nice, average sound quality, long and flexible mic
reviews.reviewText: I needed a few mics for my desktop machines' voice controls and did not require high-quality, broadcast audio. Was very happy to find this model—I bought two. Level is excellent and hardware volume and mute buttons are super convenient. Excellent build quality. What an incredible value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This makes quality sounds
reviews.reviewText: This is a very inexpensive microphone that makes good, quality sounds for my Zoom sessions and videos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works on iPad Pro with adapter hub
reviews.reviewText: Can confirm - works on many (NOT ALL) apps on iPad Pro 2020 if using the Apple usb C multiport digital adapter hub. The adapter costs $69 so I use the Insignia brand for $35 instead, which works great. A regular adapter might work too but not sure.It automatically works when recording video or GarageBand audio just fine. But I really wanted to try it for calls.On iPad Pro: it works with Zoom and Bluejeans. It did not work on MS Teams or Google Hangouts.Everything works normal on PC.Build: Feels sturdy. Base is big and heavy plastic with a volume knob and mute button. Wire seems fine. Goose neck is bendable at the base, stiff in the middle and bendable near the end. Longer than I expected. Easy to adjust.Sound: Picks up a lot if volume knob is turned all the way up, in addition to background noises. I find anything above 50% gets way too distorted and has a slight hiss in the background bc it gets too sensitive and picks up every sound in the room (ac or fan or echoes). My ideal range is 30-40% volume as it keeps the voice audible without distortion and cuts out background noise. I keep the mic 6-12 inches back for best results, which also leaves it out of the video. It doesn’t have the rich timbre of a blue yeti, yet it is more clear than the muffled sounding blue snowball. Has a slight background hiss compared to the blue yeti, but only noticeable if you are listening for it, and the hiss sounds quiet compared to the Blue snowball. Though it has a foam cover, plosives still make its way through. May have to invest in the world’s tiniest pop filter.Because of the balance of features and price, I think it’s near perfect for video conferencing. Personally I wish it was a bit smaller to make it more portable, and/or that it had a headphone jack. As far as quality and functionality, I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality for the price
reviews.reviewText: Does what it's supposed to do. People used to complain that my voice was muddy on Zoom meetings with the computer mic. Now everyone can hear me perfectly. The physical input volume control and mute button are very intuitive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised.
reviews.reviewText: Plugged it in and it worked right away. The mic pics up your voice really well. You do not have to lean into the mic. It sits on my desk and it is able to hear me from a couple of feet away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive for the money
reviews.reviewText: This microphone exceeded my expectations. I spend a lot of the day on zoom calls and feedback is that sound is much better with this microphone than what I was using previously. I recommend this microphone. It is good quality easy to install and then overall good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product and sound fine for gaming
reviews.reviewText: Plug and play (I'm using Windows 11) - plug it in and it just works. Looks to be good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best budget microphones on the market.
reviews.reviewText: My experience with audio recording equipment is vast. I am an audio production specialist for multiple media groups, and have extensive knowledge on just what to look for when it comes to picking up a piece of recording gear.Typically, 30 dollars doesn't get you very far in this department. However, I can say beyond a shadow of a doubt that the K052 has blown that assumption out of the water.Though the K052 isn't, by any means, a piece of professional recording gear, it will take you incredibly far in the world of entry level recording. It has an incredibly level sound profile, with a slight emphasis on the low end that is perfect for voice over. The included pop filter does an incredible job of catching any imperfections that may occur, and the mic's small profile allows it to be placed virtually anywhere. The incredible length of the cable and the super flexible gooseneck helps this aspect immensely.More so, the build quality of this mic is absolutely incredible! Fifine spared no detail on the body of this piece of gear, with the hefty base sporting heavy duty plastic and metal. To top it off, the mic has a tactile mute button and a super convenient in-line volume knob.It still blows me away that this mic is less than 30 dollars. For this price, you are getting above and beyond what you paid for, as is expected of a company like Fifine. I would happily purchase a product from them in the future.If you would like, please check out my youtube review (/c/hammyplays) for loads more information on this piece of gear. Thank you!
Excelente custo benefício. Captação profissional direto no computador (OBS), tem precisar de interface

reviews.reviewerName: ப்ராடக்ட் குறித்த தேதியில் டெலிவரி செய்ய முடியவில்லை

reviews.reviewText: Not really, the knob given on the microphone is not much of a use. You should better go for the cheaper version of this mic, one without the knob. It's sound quality is like a normal wired earphone's mic quality & if you have a lot of background noise you better lower the dB value in the settings around 18 or so. I would suggest you can get the same quality of mic with lower price so go for that.
